snippet: A spokeswoman for Yad Vashem, the Holocaust memorial museum in Israel, explains why an Arab man was not honored for his wartime actions.
lead_paragraph: A spokeswoman for Yad Vashem, the Holocaust memorial museum in Israel, explains why an Arab man was not honored for his wartime actions.

headline.main: Harboring Jews in Tunisia: The View From Yad Vashem
headline.print_headline: Harboring Jews in Tunisia: The View From Yad Vashem
